product_name: Bumble and bumbleThickening Full Form Soft Hair Mousse
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingBumble and bumble's Thickening Full Form Soft Mousse is a weightless heat protectant hair mousse adds volume and body to create voluminous styles. It's moisturizing - with a soft, cushiony, crunch-free feel.
details: DetailsBenefitsVolumeSoftensDefinesFragrance FamilyInspired by the fresh sea air and brilliant warm sun, this crisp, invigorating fragrance is as uplifting as the Thickening Collection itself - with sparkling top notes of lemon and bergamot, plus crisp apple and water lily enhanced by the drydown of cedar wood and white musk.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesMineral OilFormaldehydeItem 2532743How To UseShake well, turn the can upside down, and dispense into palm. Spread through damp hair and blow-dry.From the Pros: When air-drying, use at the roots to help give hair volume. Apply directly on a detangling brush and distribute from roots to ends for even coverage. Ideal for Fine to Medium hair types seeking a soft, crunch-free volumizing mousse.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Isobutane, Propane, Polyquaternium-11, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Wheat Amino Acids , Vp/Va Copolymer, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Laureth-4, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Cetrimonium Chloride, Panthenol, Sodium Lactate, Polyquaternium-4 , Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium PCA, Disodium EDA, Fragrance (Parfum), Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Citronellol, Citral, Limonene, Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin, Geraniol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Shake well, turn the can upside down, and dispense into palm. Spread through damp hair and blow-dry.From the Pros: When air-drying, use at the roots to help give hair volume. Apply directly on a detangling brush and distribute from roots to ends for even coverage. Ideal for Fine to Medium hair types seeking a soft, crunch-free volumizing mousse.

reviews.headline: Nice and managed styled hair
reviews.comments:
After shampooing and dry my hair, I spray this before using the large hot rollers and it makes my shoulder-length hair so voluminous and nice-lifting
. It provides thickness, texture and soft hold and it doesn't feel like I have any stiff in my hair. From now on, this is a keeper.

reviews.headline: I keep buying!
reviews.comments: I have fine hair and this improves the texture and give my hair body whether I air dry or use my hair dryer. I am a repeat buyer and plan to continue.

reviews.headline: It gives my hair the body it needs.
reviews.comments: It makes blow drying my hair easier and more manageable with full body,

reviews.headline: Wasn't sure about this product at first...
reviews.comments: When I first used this product I was not all that impressed. I felt I still needed another styler to help keep my curls from getting frizzy and add more definition. I kept experimenting with it and I'm glad I did. To style my hair I start with Bumble & Bumble Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Heat/UV Protective Hair Primer Leave-In Conditioner, then follow with a bit of this mousse and lastly, I layer on Ouidad Advanced Climate Control Heat & Humidity Gel in the white bottle. I will finger style my curls and let air dry overnight. In the morning I comb through my hair with my fingers, flip my hair upside down and LIGHTLY mist with water using a super fine spray bottle to reactivate the product. Then I dry for a few minutes on high heat, lowest air setting with a diffuser. Flip hair back over and finger comb again to separate curls a bit. I get amazing volume and super soft, bouncy curls. My hair is a layered shoulder length cut and using this mousse gives me that gorgeous "soft focus" 80's glam look. This is a holy trinity for my curls now. This mousse really is the key to longevity. I get 3 days of awesome curls, due to how this mousse seems to give the curls "memory" hold, if you know what I mean, without being stiff or tacky. I even go on 5k runs, during my week w/o washing and the next day my curls still look fab. The secret is to use less, too much of this mousse and it will feel gritty, almost as though this is a texturizing product.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I bought this product while looking for a good volume enhancing mousse for my hair. I used it along with the Colorwow raise the root and absolutely love both products together! Gave me shine, so much added volume and my hair looked so good!

reviews.headline: It's fine
reviews.comments: It's fine, I used it, but I think there are better options for the same price.

reviews.headline: Best Mousse!
reviews.comments: I tried this on a whim and now cannot go back to any other mousse. It adds a lot of volume for my fine, thin hair and conditions. I don't have to deal with staticy hair like I do with other products. It adds a small amount of hold, which is what I wanted, so your hair is still touchable and soft throughout the day.

reviews.headline: Best mouse to use.
reviews.comments: A good priducu

reviews.headline: Does nothing for the price
reviews.comments: I dont mind paying for good products, but this isnt one. It does not thicken or add volume, and does not help hold hair styles. It also smells horrible.

reviews.headline: Highly recommend
reviews.comments: I have fine thin hair and feel like I have tried every hair product on the market to add volume. This is hands down the best mousse I have ever used.

reviews.headline: Quality mousee
reviews.comments: I have used this product for years.  Unfortunately sometimes the can is defectiveâ€¦ mousse-drizzles out and had to return it.  Limited stock, so the other can did not work either.   Got my money

reviews.headline: Great for very fine hair.
reviews.comments: Gives fullness and lots of body to very fine hair!  Love the product! My hair feels thicker and fuller and is easier to style.

reviews.headline: FAIL
reviews.comments: I purchased this item on recommendation from Hair Stylist which I do regularly.  I would think they would stear you the right direction as i am a regular client paying a lot for services and the product was junk.  No the first time steared me wrong!

reviews.headline: Love The Mousse..but
reviews.comments: I love this mouse and have used it for years. Don't expect to get the free pret a powder though. Unless you can add the free item to the cart it never comes. Huge bummer

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: This product is very good.

reviews.headline: Love this mousse.
reviews.comments: My colicky, unruly bangs loves it as well as the rest of my hair. Gives my hair a lift that's never stiff or crunchy. I've tried numerous well known brands but I've finally found the one that's just right for my straight blonde hair. Try it! You might just love it like me.

reviews.headline: love this product
reviews.comments: I just love bumble and bumble, really does the job, and I need a hair  thickener

reviews.headline: I would not buy this priduct again
reviews.comments: To pricey and delivery system not that good or I got a bad can

reviews.headline: Highly recommend
reviews.comments: I would highly recommend this product for fine, curly hair. I have been through many brands and this is one of the only ones that provides my curls with a soft yet firm hold that last all day. In addition, it is lightweight and it does make my hair appear thicker. It also smells great so that is a plus.

reviews.headline: Finally ðŸ˜Š
reviews.comments: I've tried so many mousses before, and they never delivered anything close to this product . Bumble and bumble's mousse is a game changer for my hair. It gives me a ton of volume, smells good, and doesn't require much. I can totally see the difference in the volume of my hair when I don't use it highly recommend.

faceoff_positive.comments: When I first used this product I was not all that impressed. I felt I still needed another styler to help keep my curls from getting frizzy and add more definition. I kept experimenting with it and I'm glad I did. To style my hair I start with Bumble & Bumble Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Heat/UV Protective Hair Primer Leave-In Conditioner, then follow with a bit of this mousse and lastly, I layer on Ouidad Advanced Climate Control Heat & Humidity Gel in the white bottle. My hair is a layered shoulder length cut and using this mousse gives me that gorgeous "soft focus" 80's glam look. This is a holy trinity for my curls now. This mousse really is the key to longevity. faceoff_positive.headline: Wasn't sure about this product at first...

faceoff_negative.comments: I was amazed and thrilled when I first tried the original formula.  It gave my very fine, ALREADY soft hair the perfect texture.  It felt fuller, looked fuller and yet my hair didn't have that "tacky" feeling.  It was very very natural.  My hair felt great and looked great.  I had FINALLY found the perfect mousse after many trial and errors.  Then I purchased several cans to have on hand......not noticing the "tricky" added word of SOFT to the product name until after using it several times and wondering if I had received a "defective" product.  I AM SO DISAPPOINTED.  The new version makes my fine hair soft â€¦...way too soft.  I assume most people that have baby fine hair like mine already have hair that is too soft. The last thing I need is to make it softer!!!  It just lays flat on my skull.....like baby hair!! I think it was false advertising to change one word on the can....and totally change the product.  PLEASE PLEASE BRING BACK ORIGINAL FORMULA
faceoff_negative.headline: WHAT have they done to my favorite mousse???!!!!

rollup.name: Thickening Full Form Soft Hair Mousse
